QuestData.Title: Heroic: Thorim's Sigil
QuestData.Description: Thorim's not himself, $n. He's come under a dark influence.$B$BAn evil presence under the guise of an illusion pretends to be his lost wife, Sif.$B$BYe can't let him be overcome by this impostor's spell. If he does, the location of his sigil might forever be lost!$B$BYer going to have to beat some sense into him and yer going to have to do it quick.$B$BAs always, the Archivum Console will give ye all the gory details... even the ones ye don't like.
QuestData.LogDescription: Prospector Loren at the Archivum in Ulduar wants you to obtain Thorim's Sigil.$B$BFor more information on obtaining Thorim's Sigil consult the Archivum Console.
QuestData.RewardText: Ye never cease to impress, $n.$b$bYe and me are having a pint together after all this is done, ye hear me?
